supermarket

Class SuperMarche

  • java.lang.Object
    • simj.SimSimulation
      • supermarket.SuperMarche

  • public class SuperMarche
extends SimSimulation
    This class implements a supermarket. There is a shopping area (resouce number 1) and two cash desks (resources number 2 and 3). Each cash desk has its waiting queue. The time spent in the shopping area and in the cash desk depends on the number of items the client buys.
    Author:
    Patrik Fuhrer

      • Fields inherited from class simj.SimSimulation
